title: The word "adjacent" shall also include the land of the same owner separated by nallah, river, canal, road etc
clause_text: The word "adjacent" shall also include the land of the same owner separated by nallah, river, canal, road etc., for the purpose of this regulation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The word "adjacent" shall also include the land of the same owner separated by nallah, river, canal, road etc., for the purpose of this regulation.
